messages.subject: unschooling solo
messages.msgSnippet: Hi: I m just wondering if there are any other unschoolers who are doing this solo -- as in single parent?  I have 2 girls (ages 9 & 10) and we ve unschooled
messages.messageBody:
Hi:

I'm just wondering if there are any other unschoolers who are doing this solo -- as in single parent? I have 2 girls (ages 9 & 10) and we've unschooled for a year. I've worked at home most of their lives. They did go to school for a few years (my own ignorance), but then I learned about the wonderful world of homeschooling, then unschooling, and we're loving it.

Anyway, I'd just like to connect with anyone else in a similar position, if possible.

Thanks!
Joanne


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
